Name: Core Passive: Crimson Mane Guard
Additional Ability: Batter Up!
Descriptions: When Lucy uses her <color=#ffffff>Special Attack</color> or <color=#ffffff>EX Special Attack</color>, a guard boar will join the battle and call in two other guard boars. The guard boars inherit Lucy's ATK and Impact. The <color=#ffffff>Cheer On!</color> buff for the guard boars is increased to <color=#2BAD00>140%</color> of the original effect, and their attack frequency is increased.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
The guard boars inherit Lucy's CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG.

Cons.Name: Drill Formations
Cons.Effect: When the guard boars launch <color=#ffffff>Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!</color>, Lucy recovers 2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 15s, with each guard boar having its own separate cooldown.

Cons.Name: Little Boar Captain
Cons.Effect: When Lucy uses a <color=#ffffff>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#ffffff>Ultimate</color>, it grants all squad members, Bangboo, and the guard boars the <color=#ffffff>Cheer On!</color> status for 10s.

Cons.Name: Chaos Ball Game
Cons.Effect: While in the <color=#ffffff>Cheer On!</color> state, allies' CRIT DMG is increased by an additional 10%.

Cons.Name: Fierce Fangs of Fire
Cons.Effect: When an ally in the <color=#ffffff>Cheer On!</color> state hits an enemy with an <color=#ffffff>EX Special Attack</color>, a guard boar will drop from the sky and cause an explosion, dealing <color=#ff5521>Fire DMG</color> equal to 300% of the guard boar's ATK. This will extend the duration of the <color=#ffffff>Cheer On!</color> buff for all squad members by 5s. The duration can increase up to 3 times, with a maximum duration of 30s. Refreshing the <color=#ffffff>Cheer On!</color> state resets the stack count. After the guard boar's explosion, it will launch <color=#ffffff>Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!</color>.
